data.title: Impressed by Knowledge of a Flat White
data.text: I go to coffee shops all over the U.S. and 90% of the time when you ask for a flat white, puzzled eyes stare back at you. I asked for one and the barista immediately said she knew how to make it. It was perfectly made and a beautiful head on it. I also had a panini with bacon, egg, and cheese. Simply made, but perfect flavor. This is a nice little gem in downtown Cedar Rapids.

data.title: Nicest Staff Ever
data.text: I went in this place to grab coffee and a breakfast sandwich while in town on business.  They seriously have the nicest staff I've ever encountered in a place.  The coffee was really good.  The breakfast sandwich was just okay, but for $3 you can't beat it.

data.title: Service needs improvement
data.text:
I walked in the Coffe Emporium on a Friday afternoon. The only person at the counter was on the phone and let me wait a good 5 minutes which I think it's not 100% professional.
That aside, the coffee was ok. I wanted to try some of the pastries but I was turned by the attitude of the waiter.
